News.headline: Daggers Against Racism Day Ticket Information
News.page_title: Daggers Against Racism Day Ticket Information
News.URL_keywords: Daggers Against Racism Day Ticket Information
News.short_description: The ticket office is now closed before tomorrow's Daggers Against Racism Day fixture against Guiseley AFC
News.description:
Fans are still able to buy tickets for tomorrows game online, by clicking the link here. 

Don't forget that tickets for the game will go up to normal price on the turnstiles, so don't miss out on the reduced prices. 

Full information about the Daggers Against Racism Day can be found here.
